request.description:
### Login Endpoint

This endpoint allows users to log in and receive an authentication token.

#### Request Body Parameters

- `email` (text): The email address of the user.
    
- `password` (text): The password of the user.
    

#### Response

The response will be a JSON object with the following properties:

- `code` (number): The status code of the response.
    
- `success` (boolean): Indicates if the request was successful.
    
- `message` (string): A message related to the request.
    
- `data` (object): An object containing token and user information.
    
    - `token` (string): The authentication token for the user.
        
    - `user` (object): An object containing user details.
        
        - `id` (number): The user's ID.
            
        - `name` (string): The user's name.
            
        - `email` (string): The user's email address.
            
        - `role` (string): The user's role.
            
        - `email_verified_at` (string): The date and time when the user's email was verified.
            
        - `created_at` (string): The date and time when the user account was created.
            
        - `updated_at` (string): The date and time when the user account was last updated.
            
- `errors` (array): An array containing any errors encountered during the request.
    

#### JSON Schema for Response

``` json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "code": { "type": "number" },
    "success": { "type": "boolean" },
    "message": { "type": "string" },
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "token": { "type": "string" },
        "user": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "id": { "type": "number" },
            "name": { "type": "string" },
            "email": { "type": "string" },
            "role": { "type": "string" },
            "email_verified_at": { "type": "string" },
            "created_at": { "type": "string" },
            "updated_at": { "type": "string" }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "errors": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {}
    }
  }
}

 ```

### Add Availability

This endpoint allows the user to add their availability for a specific weekday and time range.

#### Request Body

- `weekday` (string): The day of the week for which the availability is being added.
    
- `start_time` (string): The start time of the availability in 24-hour format.
    
- `end_time` (string): The end time of the availability in 24-hour format.
    
- `time_zone` (string): The time zone in which the availability is being specified.
    

Example:

``` json
{
    "weekday": "Monday",
    "start_time": "15:00",
    "end_time": "23:00",
    "time_zone": "Asia/Dhaka"
}

 ```

#### Response

- Status: 201 Created
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

Example Response Body:

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "success": true,
    "message": "",
    "data": {
        "headers": {},
        "original": {
            "code": 0,
            "success": true,
            "message": "",
            "data": [],
            "errors": {
                "error": ""
            }
        },
        "exception": null
    },
    "errors": []
}

 ```

### Add Availability

This endpoint allows the user to add their availability for a specific weekday and time range.

#### Request Body

- `weekday` (string): The day of the week for which the availability is being added.
    
- `start_time` (string): The start time of the availability in 24-hour format.
    
- `end_time` (string): The end time of the availability in 24-hour format.
    
- `time_zone` (string): The time zone in which the availability is being specified.
    

Example:

``` json
{
    "weekday": "Monday",
    "start_time": "15:00",
    "end_time": "23:00",
    "time_zone": "Asia/Dhaka"
}

 ```

#### Response

- Status: 201 Created
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

Example Response Body:

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "success": true,
    "message": "",
    "data": {
        "headers": {},
        "original": {
            "code": 0,
            "success": true,
            "message": "",
            "data": [],
            "errors": {
                "error": ""
            }
        },
        "exception": null
    },
    "errors": []
}

 ```

request.description:
### Add Availability

This endpoint allows the user to add their availability for a specific weekday and time range.

#### Request Body

- `date` (string): The date for the availability.
    
- `avaiability_id` (integer): The ID of the availability.
    
- `notes` (string, optional): An optional note for the availability.

Example:

``` json
{
    "date": "2025-04-21",
    "avaiability_id": 1,
    "notes": "This is an optional note."
}
```

#### Response

- Status: 201 Created
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

Example Response Body:

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "success": true,
    "message": "",
    "data": {
        "date": "",
        "avaiability_id": 0,
        "notes": "",
        "guest_id": 0,
        "updated_at": "",
        "created_at": "",
        "id": 0,
        "avaiability": {
            "id": 0,
            "host_id": 0,
            "weekday": "",
            "start_time": "",
            "end_time": "",
            "time_zone": "",
            "created_at": "",
            "updated_at": "",
            "host": {
                "id": 0,
                "name": "",
                "email": "",
                "role": "",
                "email_verified_at": "",
                "created_at": "",
                "updated_at": ""
            }
        },
        "guest": {
            "id": 0,
            "name": "",
            "email": "",
            "role": "",
            "email_verified_at": "",
            "created_at": "",
            "updated_at": ""
        }
    },
    "errors": []
}

response.name: list

body.raw:
{
  "search": "",    // Will match date, host name/email, or guest name/email using 'like' queries
  "status": "",           // Will filter appointments by status
  "date_from": "",       // Filters for appointments on or after this date
  "date_to": "",         // Filters for appointments on or before this date
  "host_id": null,                    // Will filter appointments where the availability is owned by host with ID 3
  "guest_id": null                    // Will filter appointments where the guest ID is 8
}
